articles.author: Sumit Rajguru
articles.title: Pakistani Actor Adnan Siddiqui Targets Priyanka Chopra. Here's What Happened - Times Now
articles.description: Pakistani actor Adnan Siddiqui has criticized Bollywood actress Priyanka Chopra for calling Pakistani director Sharmeen Obaid Chinoy 'South Asian' in a recent Instagram story. Siddiqui took to Twitter to say that Chinoy is Pakistani and that Chopra should bru…
articles.content:
